topic.title: How to Add a Change Bar Inside the Publication Content

body.p: In DITA, you can mark certain content to flag it or draw attention it. This is done by filtering the content using a DITAVAL file attached to the DITA map.

For example, to add a change bar (revision mark) for particular content, you can use the following:<val> <revprop action="flag" changebar="color:blue;style:solid;width:2pt;offset:1.25mm;placement:start" val="new"/> </val>
This would result in any content that is marked with rev="new" having a blue change bar.
